physical_appearance:This is a photograph of an area beside the Telaga Warna lake in Bogor
 Indonesia. The lake is in the center of the photograph. In the foreground
 there are three men by the side of the lake on the grass. One man is standing
 one is lying down on the grass
 and the third is sitting down. The lake is surrounded by thick vegetation. The top of the photograph is folded inwards. The edges of the photograph are carved. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of an area beside the Telaga Warna lake in Bogor, Indonesia. The lake is in the center of the photograph. In the foreground, there are three men by the side of the lake on the grass. One man is standing, one is lying down on the grass, and the third is sitting down. The lake is surrounded by thick vegetation. The top of the photograph is folded inwards. The edges of the photograph are carved. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
